DOC.brief_summary: Recent study show intravitreal injection anti-VEGF agent , Lucentis ( Ranibizumab ) effective macular edema associate central retinal vein occlusion ( CRVO ) . However , little information whether predictive factor treatment outcome treatment . We plan perform comprehensive functional imaging test determine significant predictive factor .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors Ranibizumab Treatment Macular Edema With CRVO
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose present study investigate predictive factor treatment outcome intravitreal injection Lucentis ( Ranibizumab ) eye macular edema associate central retinal vein occlusion ( CRVO ) use various comprehensive clinical test include visual file , spectral-domain optical coherence tomography ( SD-OCT ) , ultra wide-field fluorescein angiography , new flicker electroretinogram ( ERG ) use skin electrode . Corrected visual acuity , visual file , spectral-domain optical coherence tomography ( SD-OCT ) , ultra wide-field fluorescein angiography , new flicker electroretinogram ( ERG ) use skin electrode perform 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month treatment . Predictive factor treatment outcome statistically analyze .
DOC.criteria: Macular edema associate central retinal vein occlusion Best correct visual acuity < 20/30 Central macular thickness > 300 Period symptom onset treatment < 12 month Any past history treatment macular edema ( e.g . antiVEGF injection , steroid , vitrectomy )
